sentences.en: Feeling melancholy , Zhang recalls his life on a sampan while scattering Shi's ashes into the sea.
sentences.cn: 张保仔独自驾着小船出海,把一嫂骨灰撒入海中.回想从前种种,仿如隔世.

sentences.en: Her grandmother and infant aunt were making their way from their ancestral village sampan.
sentences.cn: 她的祖母和尚在襁褓中的姑妈,坐桌舢板离开祖祖辈辈生活的村庄.

sentences.en: Howard said that he would not hire a sampan.
sentences.cn: 霍华德说他不再租舢板了.

sentences.en: I decided to take part in the single sampan contest at the sports meeting.
sentences.cn: 我决定参加运动会的单人舢舨比赛.

sentences.en: I saw a thirty-foot sampan [boat] that had been lifted neatly on top of the roof of a prostrated house.
sentences.cn: 我看到一个30英尺长的小船被冲到了坍塌了的房顶上。

sentences.en: It came from one last sampan approaching the docks.
sentences.cn: 答声从最后一条驶近码头的舢板上传来.

sentences.en: Lifeguard driving a sampan came to church with the priest said: "Father, come as soon as possible on!
sentences.cn: 一个救生员驾着舢板来到教堂，跟神父说：“神父，赶快上来吧！

sentences.en: Now and again we saw a worn - out sampan playing hide - and - seek with the fishes.
sentences.cn: 我们偶或见到一艘敝旧小舟,跟海中鱼族做 捉 迷藏游戏.

sentences.en: Sometimes we can see schools of fish pass by the sampan.
sentences.cn: 有时我们可以看到成群的鱼儿从舢板旁边游过.

sentences.en: The launch had hit a sampan and overturned it.

trans.tran_en: a small boat used in China and Southeast Asia
